welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Londerzeel, Belgium! Get ready to discover the charming city with its historical sites, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in everything it has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
